name: Cyberpunk 2077: Vincent Sin Edition
summary: This edition includes the following Vincent's Socks, Game Discs with Case, World Compendium Detailing the Game's Setting and Lore, Postcards from Night City, Map of Night City, Stickers, Game Soundtrack (Download), Art booklet featuring a selection of art from the game (Download), Cyberpunk 2020 sourcebook (Download), Wallpapers for desktop and mobile (Download), "GANGS OF CYBERPUNK" Woven Badges
